why new york’s young artists are leaving the city and moving upstate | read | i-D
extended: In May 2010, Patti Smith told students at Cooper Union that New York was no longer the city for them. "New York has closed itself off to the young and struggling," she said. "New York City has been taken away from you. So my advice is: Find a new city."

description: Helmut Lang 2016 Low Top Sneaker | HYPEBEAST
extended: In line with the brand’s venture into , Helmut Lang’s new Low Top Sneaker features a modernist approach to a simple silhouette. Made of Italian nylon, the sneaker’s upper incorporates different material textures for hints of contrast in two monochrome : Black and Nato Green.

description: Sol LeWitt Biography, Art, and Analysis of Works | The Art Story
extended: Sol LeWitt earned a place in the history of art for his leading role in the Conceptual movement. His belief in the artist as a generator of ideas was instrumental in the transition from the modern to the postmodern era.

description: A hostage negotiator explains how to survive Thanksgiving with your pro-Trump family members
